mapper.select: SELECT lecture_subject_no lectureSubjectNo , lecture_name lectureName , subject_name subjectName FROM lecture_subject
SELECT l.lecture_name lectureName FROM lecture l INNER JOIN teacher t ON l.teacher_name = t.teacher_name WHERE t.account_id = #{accountId} AND l.lecture_state = '수강'
SELECT e.lecture_name lectureName FROM education e INNER JOIN account a ON e.account_id = a.account_id WHERE a.account_id = #{accountId}

SELECT s.schedule_no scheduleNo , ls.lecture_name lectureName , ls.subject_name subjectName , DAY(s.schedule_date) scheduleDateDay FROM schedule s INNER JOIN lecture_subject ls ON s.lecture_subject_no = ls.lecture_subject_no WHERE YEAR(s.schedule_date) = #{year} AND MONTH(s.schedule_date) = #{month}

SELECT s.schedule_no scheduleNo , s.lecture_subject_no lectureSubjectNo , ed.lecture_name lectureName , ls.subject_name subjectName , DAY(s.schedule_date) scheduleDateDay FROM schedule s INNER JOIN lecture_subject ls ON s.lecture_subject_no = ls.lecture_subject_no INNER JOIN lecture l ON l.lecture_name = ls.lecture_name Inner JOIN education ed ON ed.lecture_name = l.lecture_name Inner JOIN account a ON a.account_id = ed.account_id WHERE a.account_id = #{accountId} AND YEAR(s.schedule_date) = #{year} AND MONTH(s.schedule_date) = #{month}

SELECT s.schedule_no scheduleNo , s.lecture_subject_no lectureSubjectNo , ls.lecture_name lectureName , ls.subject_name subjectName , DAY(s.schedule_date) scheduleDateDay FROM schedule s INNER JOIN lecture_subject ls ON s.lecture_subject_no = ls.lecture_subject_no INNER JOIN lecture l ON l.lecture_name = ls.lecture_name Inner JOIN teacher t ON l.teacher_name = t.teacher_name Inner JOIN account a ON a.account_id = t.account_id WHERE a.account_id = #{accountId} AND YEAR(s.schedule_date) = #{year} AND MONTH(schedule_date) = #{month}

SELECT s.schedule_no scheduleNo , s.schedule_date scheduleDate , s.lecture_subject_no lectureSubjectNo , ls.lecture_name lectureName , ls.subject_name subjectName FROM schedule s INNER JOIN lecture_subject ls ON s.lecture_subject_no = ls.lecture_subject_no WHERE s.schedule_no = #{scheduleNo}
SELECT schedule_date scheduleDate , lecture_subject_no lectureSubjectNo FROM schedule WHERE schedule_date = #{scheduleDate} AND lecture_subject_no = #{lectureSubjectNo}
